Event: Release of Magnavox Odyssey, the first commercial home video game console.
Release of the Atari 2600, which popularized home gaming.
Launch of the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), which introduced iconic games like Super Mario Bros.
Arrival of the Sony PlayStation, which brought CD-based gaming to the mainstream.
Release of Sony Playstation 2 (PS2) the most successful console of all time.

Nintendo DS provided a completely new concept for handheld gaming. Two-screens utilized at once, 
touch-screen capability, and wifi capability.
